name: Sylvantine
description:
Welcome to Sylvantine, a forest plagued by an evil virus. You, a little sprite, are summoned as the guardian of the forest to help cure the forest's heart!

Make your way through the rooms, solving puzzles and meeting the other animals, as you learn more about the Coronavirus pandemic.

Created using Tiled and GBStudio by Meesha Reiisieh and Rikesh Mehta.

Special thanks to sonDanielson and Luis Zuno.
